channel.title: Well of Souls
channel.description: Another fun "rpg". It allows you to pick and choose your world, which is basically a whole game. The main world is called Evergreen [it is the most played] and is heavily populated. It is 2.5D, and is very fun. It is on/off line. Sorry for the smallish review, I'm off to play it :). http://www.synthetic-reality.com/wosHome.htm [at the moment of this post level 78 Paladin] I'm a fast trainer, level 80 Conqueror now. Also if anyone wants to play, I can train them up a bit :) If you get nothing out of the game, you might as well try Dow Bones [one way to make LOTS of money] and another way to have fun. Also, WoS Tactics is coming out soon, another thing for Tactics/strategy fans.

item.title: Well of Souls
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

Another fun “rpg”. It allows you to pick and choose your world, which is basically a whole game. The main world is called Evergreen [it is the most played] and is heavily populated. It is 2.5D, and is very fun. It is on/off line. Sorry for the smallish review, I’m off to play it :).
http://www.synthetic-reality.com/wosHome.htm
[at the moment of this post level 78 Paladin]
I’m a fast trainer, level 80 Conqueror now.
Also if anyone wants to play, I can train them up a bit
If you get nothing out of the game, you might as well try Dow Bones [one way to make LOTS of money] and another way to have fun. Also, WoS Tactics is coming out soon, another thing for Tactics/strategy fans.
